name: Spark Alight
effect: Deal 2 unpreventable damage to target unit. Class Bonus: Deal 3 unpreventable damage to that unit instead. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: Deal 2 unpreventable damage to target unit. Class Bonus: Deal 3 unpreventable damage to that unit instead. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor:
"Just worry about the things you can't burn."
— Instructor of Fire Magic
